text: at Standard Bank group we are a
financial services organization based
out of South Africa operating in 22
countries across the continent moving
from an on premise environment that
we've operated in for 30 40 years into a
cloud environment that is very new AMS
is AWS manage services it is a service
from AWS that enables us as a customer
to operate our workloads in the cloud in
a secure stable and cost effective way
they bring us a highly automated
infrastructure operation space uh with a
very very secure rapper that goes around
that and that enables us to give our
application teams this Freedom that they
desire um but at the same time
protecting the organization as a
financial institution required if we
were to create our own Landing Zone um
the creation of the landing zone is very
quick but the security and compliance
and regulation that we need to put in
place around it as a financial
institution would take us months if not
years to create bringing AMS on board
enabled us to build it inside of a
3-month period they come with an out
thebox um set of compliance rules and
policies that they they frame your whole
container in which um is just
exponentially faster than we could do it
if we were trying to build it trying to
build it ours so there are three key
pillars
to uh building trust with an
organization and a and a successful
migration the first is your security um
the second is operational stability and
the third is protecting yourself from
Cross runaways and AMS provide that
structure that enables you to do that
